blueprint.description: Installs Kodi on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Kodi](https://kodi.tv/) is a free and open-source media player software application developed by the XBMC Foundation, a non-profit technology consortium. Kodi is available for multiple operating systems and hardware platforms, with a software 10-foot user interface for use with televisions and remote controls.
blueprint.name: Kodi
blueprint.title: Kodi
